overview:
Carol Mackinlay runs worldwide human resources and administration for Coverity, the leader in development testing applications. Coverity is a rapidly growing privately held company headquartered in San Francisco that has received Series A funding from Benchmark Capital and Foundation Capital. She has been an HR leader in telecom and software development organizations since 1995.

Prior to this, Ms. MacKinlay spent over 10 years as a strategic, financial and operations consultant. She has held executive and analytic positions for KPMG Peat Marwick, Providian Financial, Blue Cross of California, and the City of San Jose. She has been a Board member for Junior Achievement, the Santa Cruz County Business Council, Second Harvest Food Bank, and the Santa Cruz Workforce Investment Board.

She has a BA in Applied Mathematics from UC Berkeley, and an MBA in Tax and Accounting from the University of Southern California Marshall School of Business.
